The Dawn Chorus in Wytham Woods

Click on the 'listen' button to begin.
Please note that this site will not work on some smartphones and browsers.

Location: Wytham Woods, Oxford, UK
Datetime: 14/04/2022 04:00 (UTC)
Duration: 31m 37s

As light levels increase and dawn nears more species begin to sing—how many can you recognise?
